Picturesquely placed in a beautiful no-through road, within walking distance to the prestigious Yarra Valley Grammar secondary school, this spacious and open family home occupies one of the best locations the area has to offer.

Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, timber framed windows, shade and block out blinds throughout add to an immaculately presented offering in an incomparable location.
Close to Luther College, local primary schools and Croydon Hills shopping, cafes and services, and with easy access to Wonga and Kalinda roads, the Maroondah Highway, Eastlink and Eastland.
